column1: Profile Description
Hi there
column2: I've spent the last 10 years working in hospitality and just recently moved to London. I'm looking for a new career path in tech and am excited to increase my knowledge through coding buddies!

column1: Finished a very intensive coding bootcamp and now looking for a job as a junior software developer and my ultimate goal is to have my own product/app (a company/startup).
Hi
column2: there! I have changed many jobs since I came to UK in 2014. most recently I was a delivery driver which I would say is both rewarding but very stressful and time consuming job which is the main reason I have looked into learning to code and change my work/life balance. I am planning on learning to code
column3: keep improving and prove that no matter the history you've had you can change

column1: Have been running my own property services business with my better half for half a decade. Covid 19 sucks so decided to make the most of it and make some Lemonade. I am Looking forward to up skilling and learning some code!

I'm currently a Trustee of a charity my friend started called 'Lymphoma Out Loud'. Before this I was an Account Executive for the video platform Zoom. I was one of the first 10 people in UK. I left to focus more on the charity. Reason I wanted to develop my skills with coding is that I've always been the person 'selling' the solution. I want to be the person who develops instead.
I am pursuing a career in the exciting world of Tech after travelling around the world for a few years. Prior to that I worked in Rail Operations.
I graduated as web designer in Paris and worked as multilingual marketer/International SEO Manager at the French Media Agency Publicis Groupe. As hobbies on the side
column2: I started building Wordpress sites for my friends and some freelance clients but heavily relying on offshore web developers to fix plugins. That's how I got interested in coding... My career goal is to learn how to build tech products from scratch and join a tech startup with a global presence. I have particular interests in site speed optimisation
column3: automation and technical SEO and web security.Ex Service Engineer
column4: looking to change career into Web Development or Software Programming. Have a bit of experience with WordPress
column5: during the lock down manage to create my own website. My next goal after the boot camp is become full stack software developer.
